item.title: How web application work?
item.description: Chapter 1: How Web Applications Work | Hacking APIs Book Web App Basics The URL All URLs include the protocol used, the hostname, the port, the path, and any query parameters: Protocol://hostname[:port number]/[path]/[?query][parameters] The port, a number that specifies a communication channel, is only included if the host does not automatically resolve the request to the proper port. The query is an optional part of the URL used to perform functionality such as searching, filtering, and translating the language of the requested information.
